numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This graph shows communication between young men and their parents.
2. This graph shows communication between young women and their parents.
3. Less than 25% of young men visit their parents in person often.
4. Less than 25% of young women visit their parents in person often.
5. Less than 75% of young men send texts to their parents.
6. Less than 75% of young women send texts to their parents.
7. Sending a text is an easy action.
8. A person can send a text once a day.
9. Girls communicate with their parents more than boys.
10. I wonder why girls communicate with their parents more than boys.
13. I wonder if the amount of my communication with my parents will change when I get older.
14. The name of this graph is "The Curve of Kid Conversations".
